name: 唄う星 ～The earth that the pupil watches～
summary: Singing Star ~The earth that the pupil watches~ (唄う星 ～The earth that the pupil watches～ Utau Hoshi ~The earth that the pupil watches~) is a music album by Earl Gray released on 2010-03-14 (Reitaisai 7).
